tool_description: Provides cost estimates for diagnostic trouble code repairs including parts, labor, and total expected expenses based on local market data.

zip_code.description: Location zip code for regional pricing

warranty_coverage.description: Whether vehicle has active warranty coverage

include_diagnostic_fee.description: Include diagnostic fee in cost estimate

error_messages: Invalid vehicle information: Make, model, year combination not found in pricing database.
Invalid location: Zip code must be valid US postal code for regional pricing.
Mileage out of range: Vehicle mileage must be realistic positive integer.
Invalid repair parameters: repair_level must be [basic, standard, premium], shop_type must be [dealership, independent, chain].
Cost data unavailable: Pricing information not available for one or more specified repairs.
usage: Provide DTC codes, complete vehicle information, location, and repair preferences. Tool calculates itemized cost estimates with regional adjustments.

parts_costs.description: Estimated parts cost for each DTC repair

labor_costs.description: Estimated labor cost for each repair

total_estimates.description: Total repair cost estimate for each DTC

grand_total.description: Sum of all repair costs plus diagnostic fee

warranty_savings.description: Potential savings if warranty covers repairs

confidence_level.description: Accuracy confidence of cost estimates (high, medium, low)
